meanings.definition: The quality or state of being transcendent.
meanings.sent1: Her paintings captured the transcendencies of nature in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist's work reflected the beauty and transcendencies of the natural world.
meanings.sent3: The transcendencies of the sunset made everyone stop and admire its beauty.
meanings.sent4: The music soared with transcendencies, lifting the audience to new emotional heights.
meanings.sent5: The writer's words painted a vivid picture of the transcendencies of love and loss.

meanings.definition: The act of transcending or surpassing.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to his craft led to transcendencies in his field.
meanings.sent2: The team's hard work resulted in transcendencies that amazed their competitors.
meanings.sent3: The transcendencies of the race were unexpected but well-deserved.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed propelled her to transcendencies beyond her wildest dreams.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's training regimen pushed him to new transcendencies of speed and strength.
